sentences.en: Among them, there are the emotional effects of epinephrine, dopamine, serotonin and endorphin, and so on.

sentences.en: As a matter of fact, recent studies have shown that even the anticipation of laughter increases endorphin levels.
sentences.cn: 事实上，最近有研究显示，甚至对笑的期待也会增加内啡呔水平。

sentences.en: Butexercise can be a great way to relieve stress endorphin which will improve your mood.

sentences.en: Endorphin can enhance our immune system. To increase our level of endorphin, smile.

sentences.en: If the scans showed that endorphins were being produced and were attaching themselves to areas of the brain involved with mood, that would be direct evidence for the endorphin hypothesis.

sentences.en: Injections of α - endorphin acted as a tranquilizer and a mild analgesic.
sentences.cn: 注射α内啡肽后起镇静作用,也起和缓的止痛作用.

sentences.en: It also can cause an endorphin rush that is quite pleasant and might make you forget about the heat.
sentences.cn: 此外，辛辣食物还会促进脑内啡的分泌，让你产生快感，忘掉炎热。

sentences.en: Music, sports, drawing, and calligraphy can enhance our secretion of endorphin and make us feel good.
sentences.cn: 音乐 、 运动 、 绘画或书法,都可以促进安多芬的分泌,产生畅快的感觉.

sentences.en: Smiling can help reduce the level of stress-enhancing hormones like cortisol, adrenaline and dopamine, increase the level of mood-enhancing hormones like endorphin and reduce overall blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 微笑可以帮助降低提升压力荷尔蒙的含量，如皮质醇、肾上腺素和多巴胺，增加提升情绪荷尔蒙的含量，如脑内啡，并降低整体血压。

sentences.en: The increased rate of the body's endorphin production helps the client through the crucial withdrawal period.
sentences.cn: 身体 “ 吗啡激素”水平的不断增加可以帮助客户顺利度过至关重要的“戒断期”.

sentences.en: When this happens, stress and pain occur, causing endorphin levels to rise in the brain.
sentences.cn: 在该情况下，紧张和疼痛向大脑反馈，从而增加的内啡肽的释放。

sentences.en: Whereas exercise has a positive impact boosting self-esteem, sense of control and endorphin levels.
